Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Money Movers

programme.title: Leader's Playbook
programme.desc: This episode of Leader's Playbook takes you inside Netflix the #1 streaming platform in the world. In this candid interview with CEO Ted Sarandos, CNBC's Julia Boorstin explores the CEO's leadership playbook to understand the strategies that changed what we watch and how we watch it. This insightful conversation covers it all from Sarandos' journey from video store manager to global hit maker and how the leader empowers his teams to succeed.

programme.title: Leader's Playbook
programme.desc: This episode of Leader's Playbook takes you inside Shake Shack, one of the fastest growing restaurant chains in America. In this candid interview with founder Danny Meyer, CNBC's Julia Boorstin explores Meyer's leadership playbook to reveal the strategies that helped the serial entrepreneur turn a hot dog cart in NYC into an international burger empire. The insightful conversation covers it all from his leadership secret sauce to what he looks for in every new hire.

programme.desc: Professional snowboarder Danny Kass, winner of two Olympic silver medals and even more Winter X Games bling, teams up with Australian colleague Luke "the Dingo" Trembath for a rollicking sports travel series. If there's fresh powder and a steep incline, chances are these two fun-loving guys and their entourage are speeding there in their customized RV, eagerly awaiting the chance to display their talents. While the emphasis is on snowboarding, the energetic hosts also dabble in any other extreme sport that may come their way, as well as the usual off-hour, juvenile high jinks.

programme.title: Glitch
programme.desc: Simon Hetrick is not your typical free surfer. His job is not just to perform in front of the camera. He also edits, produces, and records some of the music in his videos. programme.desc: Oddball anchormen Jeff "The Captain" Carlson and Chris Casey share the latest news in the world of skateboarding in this on-the-cheap, bizarro broadcast designed to appeal to the sensibilities of today's young skaters. Set in what appears to be a wood-paneled basement, our two sick hosts discuss their favorite sport, with top dogs of the skateboard circuit dropping in for a visit. Posers like Mom and Dad might find these freewheeling goofballs a bit sketchy, but their teenage kids will be stoked.

programme.desc: For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. programme.desc: Uncle Joe decides to go into the cologne business.

programme.title: Hawaii
programme.desc: A New England missionary (Max von Sydow) and his bride (Julie Andrews) bring Christianity to 1820s Hawaii.

programme.title: The Nebraskan
programme.desc: War looms on the horizon when an Army officer's American Indian aide is accused of murdering a tribal elder.

programme.title: The Law and Jake Wade
programme.desc: A lawman's (Robert Taylor) former outlaw partner (Richard Widmark) forces him at gunpoint to lead the way to their buried loot.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A rancher (Glenn Ford) fights a land-grabbing cattle baron (Edward G. Robinson) whose wife (Barbara Stanwyck) and brother are having an affair.

programme.title: Jack McCall, Desperado
programme.desc: A lone gunslinger, Jack McCall (George Montgomery), bursts into a saloon and shoots dead the legendary Wild Bill Hickok (Douglas Kennedy). Arrested and put on trial, McCall recounts a twisted tale that paints Hickok as anything but heroic, explaining how Hickok and McCall's cousin Bat (James Seay) took over McCall's family's plantation, killed his parents and even framed him for crimes he didn't commit. McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Jim Kipp (Randolph Scott) is a bounty hunter hired to find three robbers who committed a daring heist three years ago. When he arrives in a small town near the robbery, he senses that the thieves may be living there. However, many of the townspeople -- including Dr. Spencer (Harry Antrim), his daughter, Julie (Dolores Dorn), and barmaid Alice (Marie Windsor) -- are put on edge by Kipp's presence and want him gone. Kipp perseveres, hatching a plan that he thinks will draw out the bandits.

programme.title: Diamond Head
programme.desc: The head (Charlton Heston) of a Hawaiian pineapple dynasty refuses to let his sister (Yvette Mimieux) marry a native.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: Crime reporter John Jones (Joel McCrea) is turning in nothing but dull copy. His editor, unhappy with his work, hopes a change of scenery will be the thing Jones needs to get back on track. Re-assigned to Europe as a foreign correspondent, Jones is very much out of his element. When he stumbles on a spy ring, he feels ill-equipped to unravel the truth alone and he seeks help from a beautiful politician's daughter (Laraine Day) and an urbane English journalist (George Sanders).

programme.title: The Nebraskan
programme.desc: When his Indian assistant, Wingfoot (Maurice Jara), is accused of murdering a Sioux chief, Army scout Wade Harper (Phil Carey) brings him to Fort Kearney, Neb., where Colonel Markham (Regis Toomey) insists the young man has the right to a fair trial rather than handing him over to the Sioux. While in jail, Wingfoot is forced to escape with ruthless prisoner Reno Benton (Lee Van Cleef). Wade sets out with a small party to rescue his friend, with the Sioux right behind him.

programme.title: The Fatal Mallet
programme.desc: Three men play dirty tricks to charm a beautiful young woman.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes takes a holiday in Cornwall's countryside, only to have his healthy routine interrupted by something that happened during the night.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.desc: Watson finds Holmes still alive three years after his reported death at Moriarty's hands.

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: Acting couple Joseph (Jack Benny) and Maria Tura (Carole Lombard) are managing a theatrical troupe when the Nazis invade Poland. Maria is having an affair with Lieutenant Sobinski (Robert Stack), who suspects Professor Siletsky (Stanley Ridges) is a Nazi spy. With Siletsky in possession of a list of members of the Polish resistance, the Turas' company takes action. Using their skill for impersonation, Joseph and company must confuse the Nazis and stop Siletsky from handing over the list.

programme.title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
programme.desc: Flaming arrows stop four ex-convicts searching a ghost town for their buried loot.

programme.title: Jesse James at Bay
programme.desc: When a railroad company cheats Missouri farmers out of their land, Sheriff Whittaker (George "Gabby" Hayes) alerts his friend, kindhearted outlaw Jesse James (Roy Rogers), about their problem. As Jesse comes out of retirement to help the farmers, his evil look-alike, Clint Burns (also Rogers), appears in town to create havoc. Reporters Polly (Sally Payne) and Jane (Gale Storm) pressure the sheriff and railroad manager Phineas Krager (Pierre Watkin) about the increasingly tense situation.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes investigates when a prize race horse disappears and its trainer dies unnaturally.

programme.title: Life Outreach Mission Feeding
programme.desc: The hosts shed light on an initiative by a Christian organisation to fulfil the nutritional needs of malnourished children across Africa.

programme.title: South of Monterey
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland), Pancho (Martin Garralaga) and a dancer try to outfox a swindler.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The citizens of Dodge City split into groups to either welcome or protest the arrival of a controversial Civil War figure, Gen. William T. Sherman; a concerned woman wants to speak with Sherman about her fiancé, a soldier under his command.

programme.title: Wounded Warrior Project featuring Trace Adkins
Viva Las Vegas
programme.desc: All musically gifted race-driver Lucky Jackson (Elvis Presley) wants in Las Vegas is to score enough money for a new car motor so he can win the Grand Prix. When he encounters sexy swimming instructor Rusty (Ann-Margret), he considers staying around longer. After Lucky loses his winnings in the hotel pool, he's forced to remain in Vegas long enough to win back his dough -- but now he also wants to win the Rusty's heart. Unfortunately, so does his slick racing enemy, Elmo (Cesare Danova).

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
programme.desc: Girlfriends help a singing pilot (Elvis Presley) and his buddy (James Shigeta) get their helicopter-charter service off the ground.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to Hawaii from being in the army, a pineapple tycoon's rebellious son turns into an island tour guide with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
programme.desc: When fisherman Ross Carpenter (Elvis Presley) learns that the boat he helped build and currently works on is for sale, he tries but fails to get the money to buy it. Ross then decides to work as a guide for the boat's new owner, Wesley Johnson (Jeremy Slate), but the two men soon find themselves fighting over local gal Laurel (Laurel Goodwin). This puts Wesley in a tricky situation with his other love interest, Robin (Stella Stevens), as he worries that he'll never have his own boat.

programme.title: Charro!
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw's (Elvis Presley) old gang tries to frame him for the theft of a jeweled Mexican cannon.

programme.desc: Betty Jo becomes the first female contestant in the horseshoe tournament.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: An ex-gunfighter (Rod Cameron) woos two women while avenging his brother, victim of a crooked gambler.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: An outlaw (John Wayne), a prostitute (Claire Trevor), a drunken doctor and assorted others go through Indian country.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A framed Texas rancher (Robert Knapp) escapes from prison for a showdown with a saloonkeeper (Walter Coy).

programme.title: Guns of Diablo
programme.desc: A wagon master is confronted by a man he wounded years before in episodes from "The Travels of Jaimie McPheeters.".

programme.title: Charro!
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw's (Elvis Presley) old gang tries to frame him for the theft of a jeweled Mexican cannon.

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: The luck of Pat Brennan (Randolph Scott) is about to go from bad to worse; after gambling his horse away, he gets a ride from Willard (John Hubbard) and Doretta Mims (Maureen O'Sullivan). Soon, their stagecoach is hijacked by a trio of merciless bandits, led by the especially heartless Frank Usher (Richard Boone). As Usher holds the coach passengers hostage, Brennan falls in love with Doretta and develops a risky plan to free himself and the Mimses, leading to a bloody final standoff.

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: The avenging head of the McCandle clan returns to his estranged family and leads the search for his kidnapped grandson. Big Jake sets off, his sons in tow, to deliver the ransom to the kidnappers, but has little intention of handing it over without a fight.

programme.title: Guns of Diablo
programme.desc: A wagon master is confronted by a man he wounded years before in episodes from "The Travels of Jaimie McPheeters.".

programme.title: Kansas City Confidential
programme.desc: A mysterious fellow (Preston Foster) contacts a trio of criminals (Jack Elam, Neville Brand, Lee Van Cleef) to help with a bank heist. The four wear masks and remain strangers to each other, planning to reunite in Mexico to divvy up the loot. Joe Rolfe (John Payne), the man they framed to take the heat, gets his charges dropped, and the police offer him a reward if he can help recover the cash. He agrees, and when one of the thieves meets his end, Rolfe assumes his identity to catch the crooks.

programme.title: Whirlwind Raiders
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) stop bogus Texas lawmen.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A murder investigation leads Holmes and Watson on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Having caught one of Mr. Brother's killers, Earp looks for the three still at large, meeting an over-helpful Army lieutenant who hinders his search; one of the killers, disguised as a corporal, tricks a patrol into confronting a group of Cheyenne.

programme.title: The Soldier and the Lady
programme.desc: In the face of rebellion in Russia, Czar Alexander II (Paul Harvey) sends soldier Michael Strogoff (Anton Walbrook) 2,000 miles away, with a critical message for Grand Duke Vladimir (William Stack). On the train journey, Michael befriends a traveler (Elizabeth Allan) and comes into contact with a mysterious spy (Margot Grahame), who both unexpectedly aid him in his quest. Once behind enemy lines, Michael is near his hometown and his mother, whom he must avoid in order to fulfill his mission.

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate decides it is time for Betty Jo to put down the books and set out to find a significant other.

programme.title: NECTAR TRI-PILLOW -Cooler, Comfy, Better Sleep! Buy One Get One FREE!
programme.desc: Discover the Nectar Tri-Comfort Cooling Pillow for the ultimate sleep experience! Adjustable to three firmness levels to provide customized support and cooling all night long. Order NOW to get a second pillow FREE, plus a 30-night home trial!

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: The luck of Pat Brennan (Randolph Scott) is about to go from bad to worse; after gambling his horse away, he gets a ride from Willard (John Hubbard) and Doretta Mims (Maureen O'Sullivan). Soon, their stagecoach is hijacked by a trio of merciless bandits, led by the especially heartless Frank Usher (Richard Boone). As Usher holds the coach passengers hostage, Brennan falls in love with Doretta and develops a risky plan to free himself and the Mimses, leading to a bloody final standoff.

programme.title: Day of the Evil Gun
programme.desc: Returning home after disappearing three years ago, former gunslinger Lorn Warfield (Glenn Ford) finds that an Apache raiding party has kidnapped his wife and children. Though he has renounced violence, he now takes up his gun and joins forces with his neighbor, Owen Forbes (Arthur Kennedy). Complicating matters, Forbes is engaged to Warfield's wife, who believed her husband was dead. As they pursue the Apaches, the two men are joined by an Indian trader, Jimmy Noble (Dean Jagger).

programme.title: Cheyenne Autumn
programme.desc: Large-scale frontier epic telling the true story of a band of Cheyenne Indians who, starved nearly to extinction on an inhospitable reservation, embark on the long trek back to their distant ancestral homelands in Wyoming, despite opposition from the US Army. Their journey revives old hatreds - and the threat of war.

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: The avenging head of the McCandle clan returns to his estranged family and leads the search for his kidnapped grandson. Big Jake sets off, his sons in tow, to deliver the ransom to the kidnappers, but has little intention of handing it over without a fight.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: The Long Voyage Home
programme.desc: In the early day of World War II, the crew of English cargo ship the SS Glencairn -- including Swede Olsen (John Wayne), Englishman Smitty (Ian Hunter), American Yank (Ward Bond), and Irishmen Driscoll (Thomas Mitchell) and Cocky (Barry Fitzgerald) -- is sailing from the West Indies to Baltimore. Upon their arrival, their new cargo -- a load of dynamite -- puts the men ill at ease, as does the chance that there may be a Nazi spy on board and the general loneliness of seafaring.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.desc: If it's an animal roaming the wild, Jim Shockey has probably hunted it. The veteran wilderness guide and outfitter has tracked game in more than 40 countries and taken in excess of 300 species using bow, muzzleloader and rifle. In addition, Shockey has exclusive guiding territories on Vancouver Island, in the Yukon Territory, in Mexico's Sonoran Desert, and in his native Saskatchewan, all of which helps supply content for the hunting adventures seen in this award-winning series. Jim's daughter Eva, a full-fledged hunter in her own right, joins her dad on many episodes.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: It Came from Outer Space
programme.desc: (1953) Richard Carlson stars as an astronomer who sees an alien craft land. But nobody believes him - until the cloning starts in Jack Arnold's science-fiction classic.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: (1965) Thriller. Sidney Poitier plays a photojournalist aboard a destroyer whose commander's obsessive hunt for a Soviet sub could plunge the world into nuclear war.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, who created the circus.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: (2021) Crime drama based on a true story, directed by and starring Sean Penn as a talented counterfeiter who's not so good as a father. Features Penn's real-life kids Dylan and Hopper Jack.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a drifter who arrives in a small border town and tangles with a group of villains after helping a wealthy young Mexican, played by Manuel Rojas.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Black Shield of Falworth
programme.desc: (1954) Medieval action-adventure starring Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. When a peasant discovers his true lineage, he sets out to woo his noble sweetheart and avenge his father's murder.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: (2016) Poignant drama starring Dev Patel and Nicole Kidman. A man who was separated from his family as a child embarks on a journey to find his way back home.

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: No Exit
programme.desc: (2022) Thriller. A recovering addict ends up stranded at a remote visitor centre in a snowstorm with four strangers, then finds a kidnapped girl in the car park. Question is: who did it?

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: (2019) Kate Winslet, Susan Sarandon, Sam Neill and Mia Wasikowska star in this drama about a terminally ill mum who gathers her family one last time before she plans to take her own life.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: (1950) Western starring James Stewart. A gold prospector, tired of reprisal killings between whites and Native Americans, offers a truce to the Apaches' leader. But tensions resurface.

programme.title: D-Day the Sixth of June
programme.desc: (1956) Wartime romance set against the background of the D-Day landings, starring Robert Taylor and Dana Wynter. A married American officer embarks on an affair with English nurse.

programme.title: The Spoilers
programme.desc: (1955) Western. Anne Baxter, Jeff Chandler and Rory Calhoun star in a tale of fortune-seeking and treachery on the untamed Alaskan frontier.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: FRIGHTENERS, THE (1996)
programme.desc: (1996) Peter Jackson's comedy horror stars Michael J Fox as a psychic investigator in a town that has more ghouls and ghosties than you can shake a spirit stick at. But is he a fraud?

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: (1990) Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand star in Sam Raimi's crime-fighting action-fantasy. A vengeful scientist invents a synthetic skin that lets him change his appearance...

programme.title: Earwig
programme.desc: (2021) Period body-horror. In post-war Europe, an anxious man makes an edental girl frozen-saliva teeth in a dreary apartment. But now he must prepare her for life outside their four walls.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: (2001) Modern swashbuckling medieval action adventure starring Heath Ledger, Shannyn Sossamon and Paul Bettany. A lowly squire jousts his way to the top, with help from Geoffrey Chaucer.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: (2010) Apocalyptic action-horror starring Paul Bettany. God's patience runs out and He decides to wipe humanity from the face of the Earth. Can a rebel archangel save us?

programme.title: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: (1995) Crime drama set in the Bronx of the 70s, starring Larenz Tate. To support his young family, a Vietnam veteran is driven to take part in the daring robbery of an armoured truck.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Sci-fi thriller with Will Smith. In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot. Can he keep an open mind?

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: (2011) Romance meets sci-fi thriller. Matt Damon and Emily Blunt star as a politician and a dancer who begin to suspect that a shadowy group of men are interfering with their lives.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's exuberant retro horror and prequel to X. Mia Goth is Pearl - a twisted Dorothy who wants to dance up the yellow brick road to movie stardom. Can a seedy projectionist help?

programme.title: X
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's acclaimed grindhouse horror with Mia Goth. Some adult filmmakers inexplicably choose a ramshackle house in the Bible-Belt wilderness to shoot a film. It's gonna get nasty.

programme.title: Pebble Beach Concours d'Elegance
programme.desc: McLaren; Concept Lawn; Porsche; Packard.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E6 Mustang Trail Cheyenne teams up with Joe Baker to travel south of the border to wrangle wild mustangs. When Joe falls ill, a financial backer and his wife step in to join Cheyenne on the dangerous venture, fighting off renegade Indians along the way.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E7 Lone Gun Amarillo Ames asks Cheyenne to help drive a herd of cattle to Dodge City and take over the mission if he perishes. When Ames dies, Cheyenne must forcefully take on the Laverson brothers, who do not want him in charge of the drive.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Abduction When Little Joe and Hoss spend an evening at the carnival, Little Joe's date, Jennifer Beale, disappears. The carnival owner has an eye for pretty girls and intrigues Jennifer. She learns that the attraction could prove fatal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E2 There's No Place Like Home Booger and Cody team up to pen a herd of cattle, but a stubborn cow takes refuge in a fishing hole, requiring some creative wrangling. The stress of maintaining a long-distance relationship leads Bubba and Kaley to move back to Alabama for good. Booger embraces his new role as a family man and enlists young Matthew to help surprise Jaclyn with a much needed home-improvement project. Cody helps Misty throw a beef-tasting party for potential buyers. As the guys ponder using their cowboy skills to open a steak house, they decide to get some on-the-job training by working a shift during the hectic dinner rush at a local eatery.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E3 Man Down! Bubba's back in the saddle with the guys when his horse bucks and throws him on a bone-breaking fall, fractures his cowboy spirit and immobilizes his work with the cattle company. Booger enlists a bullfighter to help him wrangle his ornery Brahman cattle, and considers whether or not he has enough land to maintain the growing herd. Misty gives Cody a gift from the heart that captures both their past as a couple and honors their growing family legacy as ranchers. The guys pitch each other competing ideas for their future steakhouse, and Cody's brainstorm stands out as the one with true cowboy vision - including a name for their venture.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E26 Old Tony Old Tony, an irritable old recluse, has a reputation in North Fork as being a mean hermit. When Mark and his girlfriend, Lorrie, look for arrowheads on his land, they become trapped in quicksand. Tony shows his good-hearted nature and rescues them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Sharpshooter Lucas McCain and his son, Mark, arrive in North Fork to purchase a ranch. When Lucas enters a turkey shoot to win money for a down payment, he soon finds himself at odds with town villain Jim Lewis.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Singing Mountie A singing Mountie comes to Fort Courage looking for Agarn's look-alike Canadian cousin, Lucky Pierre Agarniere, a fur trapper accused of stealing furs. Agarn tries to clear his cousin's name and uncover the truth.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E2 How to Be Without Really Trying When Major Bradley visits Fort Courage the F Troop learns that they all will be transferred, except for Corporal Agarn, who must stay and train the G Troop. Agarn quickly finds out the new troops are more incompetent than his comrades in F Troop.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E1 Joe Meek: A Fearless Fighter Already a seasoned mountain man, Joe Meek has a reputation for raw courage and bravery among the trappers of the west. But Meek becomes a frontier legend when he risks his life in a fearless charge to save the woman that he loves from Crow warriors.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E19 Lessons Learned After his overturned conviction, a gunslinger named Randle seeks the men who testified against him and put him in jail. Meanwhile, Teaspoon's ex-wife, Polly, comes to Rock Creek to buy a saloon, but unfortunately becomes Randle's focus.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Trap Mine owners in Stagge City instigate a corrupt sheriff to falsely arrest travelers, including Cheyenne, on the charge of vagrancy. Sentenced to 90 days of hard labor in the nearby Stagge Silver Mine, Cheyenne plans his escape.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Iron Trail Cheyenne escorts a bride on a train ride while transporting $5000 for his boss. A friend informs him that a gang of young bandits plans to rob the train. Cheyenne finds out that their goal includes more than robbery.

programme.title: Breed of Violence
programme.desc: Little Joe's friend, Dolly Kincaid, daughter of the town sheriff, is always falling in with the wrong kind. She becomes involved with Vince Dagen and soon finds out he is an outlaw. It's up to Joe to try and save her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E4 Filet of Dreams Bubba's in a pinch when Cody urges him to ease his aching back with acupuncture. Cody and Misty have to find out why their herd is losing so many stillborn calves before it threatens their new business. Booger discovers the ups and downs of daddy duty when he takes care of Matthew for the day. He draws on the bonding time he had with his own grandfather to make a special new memory. The cowboys put their steakhouse dreams on the line to recruit a business partner and are confronted with their next steps: developing a full menu and creating a pop-up restaurant.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E5 True Grits The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. Bubba's back injury might keep him out of the saddle, but nothing can stop him from galloping ahead with making Andie's first birthday unforgettable with a secret surprise. Booger jumps at the chance to rebuild his family legacy by buying back his granddaddy's land, but is discouraged when his high-emotion offer is too low for the sellers. While Cody is eager to wow potential restaurant partners, his black-eyed peas - and just about everything else the guys dish up - get a big thumbs down from two chefs, threatening their plans for a pop-up steakhouse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E3 Bye, Bye, Balloon Captain Parmenter receives an urgent message that Prussian Colonel Heindrich von Zeppel is arriving to train the men of F Troop as balloonists in warfare. Agarn is skeptical but O'Rourke sees an opportunity to make a profit.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E4 Reach for the Sky, Pardner F Troop becomes a victim of a payroll robbery when bandits rob a train carrying Fort Courage's money. To protect the next payroll train, Agarn and O'Rourke volunteer to guard the payload. Impending danger awaits as the bandits are known killers.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E2 Jim Beckwourth: The Long Ride Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Debt A new rider named Matt trains to replace Lou when she gets married. However, when the new rider disappears on his first ride, Jimmy and Lou go after him. Jimmy soon discovers that the Garrett brothers are responsible for Matt's demise.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E10 Land Beyond the Law Cheyenne is on the run from the law for a crime that he did not commit in Lone Butte. To clear his name, he must infiltrate the Ellwood Gang to find the killer. His only clues are the killer's hideout and unusual belt buckle.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E11 Test of Courage A frustrated Army post commander court-martials Cheyenne for cowardice after he abandons a herd of needed Army horses. The commander wants answers and orders Cheyenne to take them to a desolate cavalry base used during enemy strikes.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Last Viking Gunnar Borgstrom stops to visit his relatives, the Cartwrights, on his way to Canada. Gunnar is hiding a dark secret and when little Joe's life is put in danger, the only way to save him is for Gunnar to come clean.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E4 Filet of Dreams Bubba's in a pinch when Cody urges him to ease his aching back with acupuncture. Cody and Misty have to find out why their herd is losing so many stillborn calves before it threatens their new business. Booger discovers the ups and downs of daddy duty when he takes care of Matthew for the day. He draws on the bonding time he had with his own grandfather to make a special new memory. The cowboys put their steakhouse dreams on the line to recruit a business partner and are confronted with their next steps: developing a full menu and creating a pop-up restaurant.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E5 True Grits The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. Bubba's back injury might keep him out of the saddle, but nothing can stop him from galloping ahead with making Andie's first birthday unforgettable with a secret surprise. Booger jumps at the chance to rebuild his family legacy by buying back his granddaddy's land, but is discouraged when his high-emotion offer is too low for the sellers. While Cody is eager to wow potential restaurant partners, his black-eyed peas - and just about everything else the guys dish up - get a big thumbs down from two chefs, threatening their plans for a pop-up steakhouse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E3 Bye, Bye, Balloon Captain Parmenter receives an urgent message that Prussian Colonel Heindrich von Zeppel is arriving to train the men of F Troop as balloonists in warfare. Agarn is skeptical but O'Rourke sees an opportunity to make a profit.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E4 Reach for the Sky, Pardner F Troop becomes a victim of a payroll robbery when bandits rob a train carrying Fort Courage's money. To protect the next payroll train, Agarn and O'Rourke volunteer to guard the payload. Impending danger awaits as the bandits are known killers.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E2 Jim Beckwourth: The Long Ride Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Debt A new rider named Matt trains to replace Lou when she gets married. However, when the new rider disappears on his first ride, Jimmy and Lou go after him. Jimmy soon discovers that the Garrett brothers are responsible for Matt's demise.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E10 Land Beyond the Law Cheyenne is on the run from the law for a crime that he did not commit in Lone Butte. To clear his name, he must infiltrate the Ellwood Gang to find the killer. His only clues are the killer's hideout and unusual belt buckle.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E11 Test of Courage A frustrated Army post commander court-martials Cheyenne for cowardice after he abandons a herd of needed Army horses. The commander wants answers and orders Cheyenne to take them to a desolate cavalry base used during enemy strikes.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Last Viking Gunnar Borgstrom stops to visit his relatives, the Cartwrights, on his way to Canada. Gunnar is hiding a dark secret and when little Joe's life is put in danger, the only way to save him is for Gunnar to come clean.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E6 Man Up The cowboys team up to wrangle dangerous long-horned cattle for a fellow rancher. Working with Bubba's feisty new colt, Booger schools his over-confident apprentice on the skills of training horses. The steakhouse plans gallop ahead with the cowboys taking lessons to learn more about the industry. Cody polishes his etiquette and studies the proper way to set a table, Bubba becomes Chef Thompson after a professional cook turns up the heat in the kitchen, and Booger partners with a butcher to sharpen his knowledge of beef. When their equipment fails, Cody and Misty unload new cow pens the old-fashioned way. When he gets the okay from his chiropractor, a relieved Bubba jumps back on his horse and rides off into the sunset with Kaley.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E7 Horse of a Different Color The cowboys team up to get their new herd feed-broke, but a stuck truck means super-mom, super-secretary Kaley has to save the day. Horse expert Booger teaches a young polo player how to ride western style, but after she challenges him to join her on the polo field, who's really getting schooled? Bubba and Kaley anxiously wait to share their daughter's first steps. To get more family time, Cody and Misty do a drive-thru date on horseback, and he clears the family fishing hole to lift his ailing Paw-Paw's spirits. And, after their crash course in cooking, one final taste test determines if Chef Bill will partner up with the cowboys to keep their restaurant dreams alive. They present their best dishes to some of the toughest critics they'll ever meet: their wives.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Great Troop Robbery Corporal Agarn experiences amnesia after falling from a horse. After seeing his condition, a phony traveling medicine man tries to frame Agarn for his own robberies. O'Rourke seeks help from an Indian detective to clear him.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E6 The West Goes Ghost O'Rourke sees another money-making opportunity on the horizon and employs Agarn and two other troops to homestead a ghost town named Paradise Junction. Their plan centers around revitalizing the town with hopes the railroad will soon pass through.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E21 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 1 The Kid and Lou's special day is approaching, and the riders prepare for the couple's upcoming wedding. Teaspoon is upset over when the Army arrives in Rock Creek to recruit young men as scouts. Meanwhile, the townspeople brace for the Civil War.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E12 War Party While out on an Army mission, Cheyenne shoots a miner in self-defense. He stays to help the miner and his wife, but dangers loom when the Sioux arrive. Their sights are on the miner's wife and his gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E13 Deadline While Cheyenne works for Charley Dolan, he finds himself in the middle of a battle between Dolan and Len Garth, a gang leader who forces Dolan and others off their land. Garth soon burns the newspaper office, but Dolan aims to rebuild.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E10 The Trail Gang Ben hires Sam Jackson to help on a cattle drive. Jackson is really Outlaw Johnny Logan. Johnny signed for the drive since it was going near the town of Waycross, where he plans to kill the Waycross sheriff, who is his father.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E6 Man Up The cowboys team up to wrangle dangerous long-horned cattle for a fellow rancher. programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E4 Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E22 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 2 The Kid and Lou's wedding day arrives. The advancement of the Civil War forces the riders to take sides. Jesse must choose between his brother Frank or his friends in the Pony Express. An encounter with renegade rebels ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E3 Midnight Cowboys In the middle of the night, a group of wayward yearlings ends up on a city baseball field, and the county sheriff asks the guys to help get them roped. Bubba's father-in-law offers him an office job, but taking the position would require him to leave the ranch in Alabama and move to neighboring Mississippi. Cody worries that he is running out of room for his growing family, forcing him to consider a new house. And, Booger gives a few lessons to a young boy who wants to learn about the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Friend Zone A shipment from Faith Cattle Company is in jeopardy when the truck gets stuck in a ditch. It's a race against the clock to get the cattle to the buyer or risk losing the deal. Bubba teams up with his father-in-law to build a custom grill prototype in hopes of launching a new business venture. Cody decides to sell a horse to help fund his dream home, but he receives an offer that is less than ideal. After getting relationship advice from Bubba and Cody, Booger ends up on a date with his best friend Ashley.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E15 The Courtship Joe and Hoss travel to Sacramento to visit Helen, the widow of Ben's friend, Josh Layton. Hoss falls in love with her and intends to marry her. All are thrilled except Adam, who has reason to believe that she is using Hoss.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Spitfire Joe finds a man burning Ponderosa land and shoots him in self-defense. Joe is left with the responsibility of the man's daughter. He brings her to the Ponderosa, unaware of her outlaw kin searching for her.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: From one CART champion to another, Cristiano de Matta sits down with Paul Tracy for a conversation on following his father's footsteps into racing, a dominating debut in CART, jumping into F1 & the strength it took t come back after a freak accident.

programme.title: 2026 DAKAR Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: This annual invite-only show in Rosemont, IL, is a show stopper, some of the best muscle cars and Corvettes are found at mcacn.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: The late Alex Xydias describes the early days of hot rodding, from pre-war four-cylinder Fords all the way up through the very first roadsters to run at Bonneville.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Sam is at Southfield Classics as they work on a special project.

programme.title: 2025 Polaris Crandon Off-Road World Championships Highlights

programme.desc: The Mustang Challenge holds an international round at the famed Circuit de la Sarthe.

programme.desc: Since 1980, this championship has developed Australia's best road racers as they aspire to follow in the footsteps of legendary riders such as Troy Corser, Mat Mladin and Anthony Gobert.

programme.desc: Since 1988, this series has evolved into one of the world's premier domestic superbike series, with its claim to fame being international stars such as Troy Bayliss, Alex Lowes and Neil Hodgson.

programme.title: RACER Debrief
programme.desc: Three generations of Unsers have earned 26 overall wins at The Race to the Clouds, and now a fourth-generation Unser, Loni, is looking to make her mark on the Colorado mountain, too. As she gets ready to ascend the 14,110ft peak for a fourth time, June 22, Loni joins the RACER Debrief to talk about her journey to racing at Pikes Peak, her 2025 program with BBI, Mobil 1 and Porsche, and the challenge of taking on one of motorsports' most memorable and unique events.

programme.title: Prodigy Racing League
programme.desc: Drafted by Williams, G2, Guild, BS+, SuckerPunch, and Thibaut Courtois, 30 of the world's best gamers, from 100K+ who entered season 1, battle in the Prodigy Racing League. Only 20 advance to the next PRL series. This is the future of motorsports.

programme.title: 2026 DAKAR Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The return of the iconic NOPI Show features their first regional car show and drift event at Lanier Raceway.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: The Professor takes viewers back in time to the mountains of the Piedmont region to understand how moonshine became the spark plug for NASCAR.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey goes out on the rails to take a look at the restoration of the 576 Steam Locomotive.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
